author: Adam Benzion
title: How COVID-19 made old-school management irrelevant
description: The COVID-19 outbreak has put the industrialized world on a lockdown, closing schools, shuttering the stock exchanges, and temporarily turning our world into a containment zone. With companies everywhere telling employees to take their laptops and work remote…
content: The COVID-19 outbreak has put the industrialized world on a lockdown, closing schools, shuttering the stock exchanges, and temporarily turning our world into a containment zone. With companies everywhere telling employees to take their laptops and work remote… [+3666 chars]
